text: Matthias Friedemann (born 17 August 1984 in Rochlitz) is a German cyclist. ==Palmares== ;2007 :2nd Grote Prijs Stad Zottegem ;2008 :1st stage 4 Vuelta a Cuba :3rd Grand Prix de la Ville de Lillers ;2009 :1st stage 1 Course de la Solidarité Olympique ==References== Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:German male cyclists
title: Matthias Friedemann
